segments.text: Hello , Miss Wu , This is Dan Robson calling from OTC limited . I'd like to check my last order . When exactly was it sent out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can check that for you right now . Would you mind holding ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Robson , I'm sorry . Our computer system is down . Could I call you back later ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Do you have my number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have it right here . I'm so sorry about this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I'll wait for your call .
segments.speaker: S1
